properties.name: app.bootstrap.admin.username
properties.description: Optional bootstrap admin username created at startup when both username and password are set.

properties.name: app.bootstrap.admin.password
properties.description: Optional bootstrap admin password created at startup when both username and password are set.

properties.name: app.bootstrap.entreprise.nom
properties.description: Singleton entreprise name seeded on startup.

properties.name: app.bootstrap.departement.nom
properties.description: Default department name seeded on startup if none exists.
